title: Apparently me asking people over and over to not be toxic is perma-bannable. Plat Account gone
body:
I guess it's time to uninstall and forget this game. Gotten ridiculous. This is the only game referenced in the ban. Plat account with a ton of skins gone for no reason.

Was playing Yuumi in ARAM, and 2 people on my team weren't happy with how I was playing her.

OP, I don't think that you should be punished for this. But I should also point out that telling a toxic person that they are toxic is just going to increase their level of obscenity. You're adding fuel to the fire by telling them that you will report them. If this is just one time thing that this has happened, then its okay. But if you have been doing it often then that's a little bit off.

Good luck with your ticket.
